source.4bdc774d: # Statistial test to check for difference between salaries
source.873912d4: The probability of having equal salary averages for the two gender is small(p-value = 3.9e-08). Hence there
source.c251c39e: There is a huge difference between salaries in legal department.
source.4f7c3bdc: Women have higher salaries than men in few occupations but the difference is minimal.
